home.title: Full Stack web and mobile developer. Angular Expert in the making
home.description: I'm a self-taught developer with proven experience with nodeJS frameworks such Angular, and vue in front-end and express, nestJS in back-end. I'm also a mobile developer with experience in flutter and ionic. I'm always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn new technologies and grow as a developer.

about.title: My Name is Christian Aránguiz. From Lautaro, Chile, developing the next technologies
about.description: With over three years of experience as a Full Stack developer, I have focused on web and mobile development, specialising in the Angular platform. | stand out as a self-taught professional, consistently motivated by new challenges and dedicated to teamwork. My experience includes teaching Angular to interns and trainees, demonstrating my ability to facilitate both personal and team development. | am adept at problem-solving and conflict resolution, aiming to establish a respectful and secure work environment that encourages the expression of opinions and the professional growth of al team members.

projects.title: This Page will be able soon!

articles.title: My first article
articles.description: This is my first article, I'm so excited to share my knowledge with you

contact.title: Let's get in touch!
contact.subtitle: There are many ways to connect with me, choose your favorite one
contact.description: Thank you for visiting my portfolio, I hope you liked it. If you want to contact me, you can do it through the following ways (click or touch any to copy the link to your clipboard): mail: c.aranguizm@outlook.com. github: https://github.com/Chris-AM/portfolio. linkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/Chris-AM/

experience.title: Analyst
experience.description: I worked as an Angular developer creating app architecture and following all platform's best practices.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: In this position, I was responsible for developing and maintaining functionalities and views of the different signature and authentication portals offered by the company. Where I also helped as Angular monitor for interns and trainees.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: I worked with many clients in different projects, developing front and back end applications.

experience.title: Front End/Mobile Developer
experience.description: In my first developer journey. I worked as a front end developer. Where I developed a mobile app using Ionic and Angular.
